description: Otter 3.3 is the current version of ANL's automated deduction system designed to search for proofs and countermodels of conjectures stated in first-order logic with equality. It is used mostly for research in mathematics and logic and also for various applications requiring deductive data processing.
name: Automated deduction for first-order logic with equality

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
